name: I.Qube
description:
I.Qube is a fast-paced single player roguelite puzzle game.

RANDOMLY GENERATED MAPS

Constant generated maps ensures that there's never a dull moment! 

RELOAD MAPS

Press X to generate a new map if you find yourself in a pinch.

Play with keyboard

CONTROLS  -

Arrow Keys/ WASD - Movement

X/U - Generate New Map
